T02TD2974E:49a-0: @49a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2974E:49a-1: gzhan gyi rig sngags kyis byas pa mnan par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02TD2974E:49a-2: dur khrod kyi g-yam pa sngon po la dug dang khrag gis sna tshogs rdo rje bris la lte ba la che ge mo la rig sngags nan zhes pa bri /
T02TD2974E:49a-3: rva rnams la lam nan zhes pa bri /
T02TD2974E:49a-4: mu khyud la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags thams cad stam bha ya nan zhes pa bri /
T02TD2974E:49a-5: de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum du aa mo gha badzra nan aom lam a'a: lam h'um lam zhes bzlas pas lam rgya gram dum nan pas bskal pa gnyis su de'i rig sngags kyi nus pa 'byung mi srid do //
T02TD2974E:49a-6: gzhan gyi rig sngags mnan pa gser gyi ri bo zhes bya ba /
T02TD2974E:49a-7: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
